standard_metadata.standard_description: Find a percent of a quantity as a rate per 100 (e.g., 30% of a quantity means 30/100 times the quantity); solve problems involving finding the whole, given a part and the percent.

question.content: **Which of the following options have the same value as $5\%$ of $35$?**

hints.content: $\blueD{5\%}$ $\greenD{\text{of}}$ $\maroonD{35}$ is the same as $\blueD{5\%}\greenD{\times}\maroonD{35}$.  To solve $\blueD{5\%}\greenD{\times}\maroonD{35}$, we need to convert $\blueD{5\%}$ to either a decimal or a fraction.
Percent means per hundred, so $\blueD{5\%}$ is equivalent to $\blueD{\dfrac{5}{100}}$ which is also equal to $\blueD{5\div 100=0.05}$.   $\blueD{5\%= \dfrac5{100} = 0.05}$
$\begin{align}\blueD{5\%}\ \text{of}\ \maroonD{35}&=\blueD{\dfrac5{100}}\cdot\maroonD{35}\\\\ &=\blueD{0.05}\cdot\maroonD{35}\\\\ &=1.75 \end{align}$  Are any of the other choices equivalent?
$5\cdot35=175$  The expression $5\cdot 35$ is **not** equivalent to $5\%$ of $35$.
$0.5\cdot0.35=0.175$  The expression $0.5\cdot0.35$ is **not** equivalent to $5\%$ of $35$.
$\dfrac5{10}\cdot35=17.5$  The expression $\dfrac5{10}\cdot35$ is **not** equivalent to $5\%$ of $35$.
The options that have the same value as $5\%$ of $35$ are:  - $\dfrac5{100}\cdot35$ - $0.05\cdot35$

question.content: **Which of the following options have the same value as $30\%$ of $81$?**

hints.content: $\blueD{30\%}$ $\greenD{\text{of}}$ $\maroonD{81}$ is the same as $\blueD{30\%}\greenD{\times}\maroonD{81}$.  To solve $\blueD{30\%}\greenD{\times}\maroonD{81}$, we need to convert $\blueD{30\%}$ to either a decimal or a fraction.
Percent means per hundred, so $\blueD{30\%}$ is equivalent to $\blueD{\dfrac{30}{100}}$ which is also equal to $\blueD{30\div 100=0.3}$.   $\blueD{30\%= \dfrac{30}{100} = 0.3}$
$\begin{align}\blueD{30\%}\ \text{of}\ \maroonD{81}&=\blueD{\dfrac{30}{100}}\cdot\maroonD{81}\\\\ &=\blueD{0.3}\cdot\maroonD{81}\\\\ &=24.3 \end{align}$  Are any of the other choices equivalent?

The fractions $\dfrac{30}{100}$ and $\dfrac{3}{10}$ are equivalent. So:  $\blueD{\dfrac{30}{100}}\cdot\maroonD{81}=\blueD{\dfrac{3}{10}}\cdot\maroonD{81}$  The expression $\blueD{\dfrac{3}{10}}\cdot\maroonD{81}$ is equivalent to $30\%$ of $81$.
$0.03\cdot 81=2.43$  The expression $0.03\cdot 81$ is **not** equivalent to $30\%$ of $81$.
$30\cdot 81=2{,}430$  The expression $30\cdot 81$ is **not** equivalent to $30\%$ of $81$.
The options that have the same value as $30\%$ of $81$ are:  - $\dfrac{30}{100}\cdot 81$ - $0.3\cdot 81$ - $\dfrac{3}{10}\cdot 81$

question.content: **Which of the following options have the same value as $70\%$ of $80$?**

hints.content: $\blueD{70\%}$ $\greenD{\text{of}}$ $\maroonD{80}$ is the same as $\blueD{70\%}\greenD{\times}\maroonD{80}$.  To solve $\blueD{70\%}\greenD{\times}\maroonD{80}$, we need to convert $\blueD{70\%}$ to either a decimal or a fraction.
Percent means per hundred, so $\blueD{70\%}$ is equivalent to $\blueD{\dfrac{70}{100}}$ which is also equal to $\blueD{70\div 100=0.7}$.   $\blueD{70\%= \dfrac{70}{100} = 0.7}$
$\begin{align}\blueD{70\%}\ \text{of}\ \maroonD{80}&=\blueD{\dfrac{70}{100}}\cdot\maroonD{80}\\\\ &=\blueD{0.7}\cdot\maroonD{80}\\\\ &=56 \end{align}$  Are any of the other choices equivalent?

The fractions $\dfrac{70}{100}$ and $\dfrac{7}{10}$ are equivalent. So:  $\blueD{\dfrac{70}{100}}\cdot\maroonD{80}=\blueD{\dfrac{7}{10}}\cdot\maroonD{80}$  The expression $\blueD{\dfrac{7}{10}}\cdot\maroonD{80}$ is equivalent to $70\%$ of $80$.
$0.7\cdot 0.8=0.56$  The expression $0.7\cdot 0.8$ is **not** equivalent to $70\%$ of $80$.
$70\cdot 80=5{,}600$  The expression $70\cdot 80$ is **not** equivalent to $70\%$ of $80$.
The options that have the same value as $70\%$ of $80$ are:  - $\dfrac{70}{100}\cdot 80$ - $0.7\cdot 80$ - $\dfrac{7}{10}\cdot 80$

question.content: **Which of the following options have the same value as $65\%$ of $20$?**

hints.content: $\blueD{65\%}$ $\greenD{\text{of}}$ $\maroonD{20}$ is the same as $\blueD{65\%}\greenD{\times}\maroonD{20}$.  To solve $\blueD{65\%}\greenD{\times}\maroonD{20}$, we need to convert $\blueD{65\%}$ to either a decimal or a fraction.
Percent means per hundred, so $\blueD{65\%}$ is equivalent to $\blueD{\dfrac{65}{100}}$ which is also equal to $\blueD{65\div 100=0.65}$.   $\blueD{65\%= \dfrac{65}{100} = 0.65}$
$\begin{align}\blueD{65\%}\ \text{of}\ \maroonD{20}&=\blueD{\dfrac{65}{100}}\cdot\maroonD{20}\\\\ &=\blueD{0.65}\cdot\maroonD{20}\\\\ &=13 \end{align}$  Are any of the other choices equivalent?
$\dfrac{65}{100}\div 20=0.0325$  The expression $\dfrac{65}{100}\div 20$ is **not** equivalent to $65\%$ of $20$.
$\dfrac{65}{20}\cdot 100=325$  The expression $\dfrac{65}{20}\cdot 100$ is **not** equivalent to $65\%$ of $20$.
$65\cdot 20=1{,}300$  The expression $65\cdot 20$ is **not** equivalent to $65\%$ of $20$.
The options that have the same value as $65\%$ of $20$ are:  - $\dfrac{65}{100}\cdot 20$ - $0.65\cdot 20$

question.content: **Which of the following options have the same value as $60\%$ of $94$?**

hints.content: $\blueD{60\%}$ $\greenD{\text{of}}$ $\maroonD{94}$ is the same as $\blueD{60\%}\greenD{\times}\maroonD{94}$.  To solve $\blueD{60\%}\greenD{\times}\maroonD{94}$, we need to convert $\blueD{60\%}$ to either a decimal or a fraction.
Percent means per hundred, so $\blueD{60\%}$ is equivalent to $\blueD{\dfrac{60}{100}}$ which is also equal to $\blueD{60\div 100=0.6}$.   $\blueD{60\%= \dfrac{60}{100} = 0.6}$
$\begin{align}\blueD{60\%}\ \text{of}\ \maroonD{94}&=\blueD{\dfrac{60}{100}}\cdot\maroonD{94}\\\\ &=\blueD{0.6}\cdot\maroonD{94}\\\\ &=56.4 \end{align}$  Are any of the other choices equivalent?

The fractions $\dfrac{60}{100}$ and $\dfrac{3}{5}$ are equivalent. So:  $\blueD{\dfrac{60}{100}}\cdot\maroonD{94}=\blueD{\dfrac{3}{5}}\cdot\maroonD{94}$  The expression $\blueD{\dfrac{3}{5}}\cdot\maroonD{94}$ is equivalent to $60\%$ of $94$.
$0.06\cdot 94=5.64$  The expression $0.06\cdot 94$ is **not** equivalent to $60\%$ of $94$.
$60\cdot 94=5{,}640$  The expression $60\cdot 94$ is **not** equivalent to $60\%$ of $94$.
The options that have the same value as $60\%$ of $94$ are:  - $\dfrac{60}{100}\cdot 94$ - $0.6\cdot 94$ - $\dfrac{3}{5}\cdot 94$

question.content: **Which of the following options have the same value as $40\%$ of $84$?**

hints.content: $\blueD{40\%}$ $\greenD{\text{of}}$ $\maroonD{84}$ is the same as $\blueD{40\%}\greenD{\times}\maroonD{84}$.  To solve $\blueD{40\%}\greenD{\times}\maroonD{84}$, we need to convert $\blueD{40\%}$ to either a decimal or a fraction.
Percent means per hundred, so $\blueD{40\%}$ is equivalent to $\blueD{\dfrac{40}{100}}$ which is also equal to $\blueD{40\div 100=0.4}$.   $\blueD{40\%= \dfrac{40}{100} = 0.4}$
$\begin{align}\blueD{40\%}\ \text{of}\ \maroonD{84}&=\blueD{\dfrac{40}{100}}\cdot\maroonD{84}\\\\ &=\blueD{0.4}\cdot\maroonD{84}\\\\ &=33.6 \end{align}$  Are any of the other choices equivalent?
$40\cdot 84=3{,}360$  The expression $40\cdot 84$ is **not** equivalent to $40\%$ of $84$.
$0.4\div 84\approx 0.00014$  The expression $0.4\div 84$ is **not** equivalent to $40\%$ of $84$.
$84\div 40=2.1$  The expression $84\div 40$ is **not** equivalent to $40\%$ of $84$.
The options that have the same value as $40\%$ of $84$ are:  - $\dfrac{40}{100}\cdot 84$ - $0.4\cdot 84$

question.content: **Which of the following options have the same value as $72\%$ of $50$?**

hints.content: $\blueD{72\%}$ $\greenD{\text{of}}$ $\maroonD{50}$ is the same as $\blueD{72\%}\greenD{\times}\maroonD{50}$.  To solve $\blueD{72\%}\greenD{\times}\maroonD{50}$, we need to convert $\blueD{72\%}$ to either a decimal or a fraction.
Percent means per hundred, so $\blueD{72\%}$ is equivalent to $\blueD{\dfrac{72}{100}}$ which is also equal to $\blueD{72\div 100=0.72}$.   $\blueD{72\%= \dfrac{72}{100} = 0.72}$
$\begin{align}\blueD{72\%}\ \text{of}\ \maroonD{50}&=\blueD{\dfrac{72}{100}}\cdot\maroonD{50}\\\\ &=\blueD{0.72}\cdot\maroonD{50}\\\\ &=36 \end{align}$  Are any of the other choices equivalent?
$72\cdot \dfrac{5}{100}=3.6$  The expression $72\cdot \dfrac{5}{100}$ is **not** equivalent to $72\%$ of $50$.
$72\cdot 50=3{,}600$  The expression $72\cdot 50$ is **not** equivalent to $72\%$ of $50$.
$\dfrac{72}{50}\cdot 100=144$  The expression $\dfrac{72}{50}\cdot 100$ is **not** equivalent to $72\%$ of $50$.
The options that have the same value as $72\%$ of $50$ are:  - $\dfrac{72}{100}\cdot 50$ - $0.72\cdot 50$

question.content: **Which of the following options have the same value as $10\%$ of $33$?**

hints.content: $\blueD{10\%}$ $\greenD{\text{of}}$ $\maroonD{33}$ is the same as $\blueD{10\%}\greenD{\times}\maroonD{33}$.  To solve $\blueD{10\%}\greenD{\times}\maroonD{33}$, we need to convert $\blueD{10\%}$ to either a decimal or a fraction.
Percent means per hundred, so $\blueD{10\%}$ is equivalent to $\blueD{\dfrac{10}{100}}$ which is also equal to $\blueD{10\div 100=0.1}$.   $\blueD{10\%= \dfrac{10}{100} = 0.1}$
$\begin{align}\blueD{10\%}\ \text{of}\ \maroonD{33}&=\blueD{\dfrac{10}{100}}\cdot\maroonD{33}\\\\ &=\blueD{0.1}\cdot\maroonD{33}\\\\ &=3.3 \end{align}$  Are any of the other choices equivalent?

The fractions $\dfrac{10}{100}$ and $\dfrac{1}{10}$ are equivalent. So:  $\blueD{\dfrac{10}{100}}\cdot\maroonD{33}=\blueD{\dfrac{1}{10}}\cdot\maroonD{33}$  The expression $\blueD{\dfrac{1}{10}}\cdot\maroonD{33}$ is equivalent to $10\%$ of $33$.
$0.1\cdot 0.33=0.033$  The expression $0.1\cdot 0.33$ is **not** equivalent to $10\%$ of $33$.
$10\cdot 33=330$  The expression $10\cdot 33$ is **not** equivalent to $10\%$ of $33$.
The options that have the same value as $10\%$ of $33$ are:  - $\dfrac{10}{100}\cdot 33$ - $0.1\cdot 33$ - $\dfrac{1}{10}\cdot 33$

question.content: **Which of the following options have the same value as $96\%$ of $25$?**

hints.content: $\blueD{96\%}$ $\greenD{\text{of}}$ $\maroonD{25}$ is the same as $\blueD{96\%}\greenD{\times}\maroonD{25}$.  To solve $\blueD{96\%}\greenD{\times}\maroonD{25}$, we need to convert $\blueD{96\%}$ to either a decimal or a fraction.
Percent means per hundred, so $\blueD{96\%}$ is equivalent to $\blueD{\dfrac{96}{100}}$ which is also equal to $\blueD{96\div 100=0.96}$.   $\blueD{96\%= \dfrac{96}{100} = 0.96}$
$\begin{align}\blueD{96\%}\ \text{of}\ \maroonD{25}&=\blueD{\dfrac{96}{100}}\cdot\maroonD{25}\\\\ &=\blueD{0.96}\cdot\maroonD{25}\\\\ &=24 \end{align}$  Are any of the other choices equivalent?
$0.96\cdot 0.25=0.24$  The expression $0.96\cdot 0.25$ is **not** equivalent to $96\%$ of $25$.
$\dfrac{96}{100}\cdot \dfrac{25}{100}=0.24$  The expression $\dfrac{96}{100}\cdot \dfrac{25}{100}$ is **not** equivalent to $96\%$ of $25$.
$96\cdot 25=2{,}400$  The expression $96\cdot 25$ is **not** equivalent to $96\%$ of $25$.
The options that have the same value as $96\%$ of $25$ are:  - $\dfrac{96}{100}\cdot 25$ - $0.96\cdot 25$

question.content: **Which of the following options have the same value as $15\%$ of $20$?**

hints.content: $\blueD{15\%}$ $\greenD{\text{of}}$ $\maroonD{20}$ is the same as $\blueD{15\%}\greenD{\times}\maroonD{20}$.  To solve $\blueD{15\%}\greenD{\times}\maroonD{20}$, we need to convert $\blueD{15\%}$ to either a decimal or a fraction.
Percent means per hundred, so $\blueD{15\%}$ is equivalent to $\blueD{\dfrac{15}{100}}$ which is also equal to $\blueD{15\div 100=0.15}$.   $\blueD{15\%= \dfrac{15}{100} = 0.15}$
$\begin{align}\blueD{15\%}\ \text{of}\ \maroonD{20}&=\blueD{\dfrac{15}{100}}\cdot\maroonD{20}\\\\ &=\blueD{0.15}\cdot\maroonD{20}\\\\ &=3 \end{align}$  Are any of the other choices equivalent?

The fractions $\dfrac{15}{100}$ and $\dfrac{3}{20}$ are equivalent. So:  $\blueD{\dfrac{15}{100}}\cdot\maroonD{20}=\blueD{\dfrac{3}{20}}\cdot\maroonD{20}$  The expression $\blueD{\dfrac{3}{20}}\cdot\maroonD{20}$ is equivalent to $15\%$ of $20$.
$15\cdot 20=300$  The expression $15\cdot 20$ is **not** equivalent to $15\%$ of $20$.
$15\cdot 0.02=0.3$  The expression $15\cdot 0.02$ is **not** equivalent to $15\%$ of $20$.
The options that have the same value as $15\%$ of $20$ are:  - $\dfrac{15}{100}\cdot 20$ - $0.15\cdot 20$ - $\dfrac{3}{20}\cdot 20$

question.content: **Which of the following options have the same value as $62\%$ of $45$?**

hints.content: $\blueD{62\%}$ $\greenD{\text{of}}$ $\maroonD{45}$ is the same as $\blueD{62\%}\greenD{\times}\maroonD{45}$.  To solve $\blueD{62\%}\greenD{\times}\maroonD{45}$, we need to convert $\blueD{62\%}$ to either a decimal or a fraction.
Percent means per hundred, so $\blueD{62\%}$ is equivalent to $\blueD{\dfrac{62}{100}}$ which is also equal to $\blueD{62\div 100=0.62}$.   $\blueD{62\%= \dfrac{62}{100} = 0.62}$
$\begin{align}\blueD{62\%}\ \text{of}\ \maroonD{45}&=\blueD{\dfrac{62}{100}}\cdot\maroonD{45}\\\\ &=\blueD{0.62}\cdot\maroonD{45}\\\\ &=27.9 \end{align}$  Are any of the other choices equivalent?
$45\div 0.62\approx 72.6$  The expression $45\div 0.62$ is **not** equivalent to $62\%$ of $45$.
$62\div 45\approx 1.38$  The expression $62\div 45$ is **not** equivalent to $62\%$ of $45$.
$62\cdot 45=2{,}790$  The expression $62\cdot 45$ is **not** equivalent to $62\%$ of $45$.
The options that have the same value as $62\%$ of $45$ are:  - $\dfrac{62}{100}\cdot 45$ - $0.62\cdot 45$

question.content: **Which of the following options have the same value as $8\%$ of $94$?**

hints.content: $\blueE{8\%}$ $\purpleE{\text{of}}$ $\maroonD{94}$ is the same as $\blueE{8\%}\purpleE{\times}\maroonD{94}$.  To solve $\blueE{8\%}\purpleE{\times}\maroonD{94}$, we need to convert $\blueE{8\%}$ to either a decimal or a fraction.
Percent means per hundred, so $\blueE{8\%}$ is equivalent to $\blueE{\dfrac{8}{100}}$ which is also equal to $\blueE{8\div 100=0.08}$.  $\blueE{8\%= \dfrac{8}{100} = 0.08}$
$\begin{align}\blueE{8\%}\ \text{of}\ \maroonD{94}&=\blueE{\dfrac{8}{100}}\cdot\maroonD{94}\\\\ &=\blueE{0.08}\cdot\maroonD{94}\\\\ &=7.52 \end{align}$  Are any of the other choices equivalent?
$0.8\cdot 94=75.2$  The expression $0.8\cdot 94$ is **not** equivalent to $8\%$ of $94$.
$800\cdot 94=75{,}200$  The expression $800\cdot 94$ is **not** equivalent to $8\%$ of $94$.
$8\cdot 94=752$  The expression $8\cdot 94$ is **not** equivalent to $8\%$ of $94$.
The options that have the same value as $8\%$ of $94$ are:  - $\dfrac{8}{100}\cdot 94$ - $0.08\cdot 94$

question.content: **Which of the following options have the same value as $80\%$ of $22$?**

hints.content: $\blueD{80\%}$ $\greenD{\text{of}}$ $\maroonD{22}$ is the same as $\blueD{80\%}\greenD{\times}\maroonD{22}$.  To solve $\blueD{80\%}\greenD{\times}\maroonD{22}$, we need to convert $\blueD{80\%}$ to either a decimal or a fraction.
Percent means per hundred, so $\blueD{80\%}$ is equivalent to $\blueD{\dfrac{80}{100}}$ which is also equal to $\blueD{80\div 100=0.8}$.   $\blueD{80\%= \dfrac{80}{100} = 0.8}$
$\begin{align}\blueD{80\%}\ \text{of}\ \maroonD{22}&=\blueD{\dfrac{80}{100}}\cdot\maroonD{22}\\\\ &=\blueD{0.8}\cdot\maroonD{22}\\\\ &=17.6 \end{align}$  Are any of the other choices equivalent?

The fractions $\dfrac{80}{100}$ and $\dfrac{4}{5}$ are equivalent. So:  $\blueD{\dfrac{80}{100}}\cdot\maroonD{22}=\blueD{\dfrac{4}{5}}\cdot\maroonD{22}$  The expression $\blueD{\dfrac{4}{5}}\cdot\maroonD{22}$ is equivalent to $80\%$ of $22$.
$80\cdot 22=1{,}760$  The expression $80\cdot 22$ is **not** equivalent to $80\%$ of $22$.
$\dfrac{22}{80}\cdot 100=27.5$  The expression $\dfrac{22}{80}\cdot 100$ is **not** equivalent to $80\%$ of $22$.
The options that have the same value as $80\%$ of $22$ are:  - $\dfrac{80}{100}\cdot 22$ - $0.8\cdot 22$ - $\dfrac{4}{5}\cdot 22$

question.content: **Which of the following options have the same value as $75\%$ of $96$?**

hints.content: $\blueD{75\%}$ $\greenD{\text{of}}$ $\maroonD{96}$ is the same as $\blueD{75\%}\greenD{\times}\maroonD{96}$.  To solve $\blueD{75\%}\greenD{\times}\maroonD{96}$, we need to convert $\blueD{75\%}$ to either a decimal or a fraction.
Percent means per hundred, so $\blueD{75\%}$ is equivalent to $\blueD{\dfrac{75}{100}}$ which is also equal to $\blueD{75\div 100=0.75}$.   $\blueD{75\%= \dfrac{75}{100} = 0.75}$
$\begin{align}\blueD{75\%}\ \text{of}\ \maroonD{96}&=\blueD{\dfrac{75}{100}}\cdot\maroonD{96}\\\\ &=\blueD{0.75}\cdot\maroonD{96}\\\\ &=72 \end{align}$  Are any of the other choices equivalent?

The fractions $\dfrac{75}{100}$ and $\dfrac{3}{4}$ are equivalent. So:  $\blueD{\dfrac{75}{100}}\cdot\maroonD{96}=\blueD{\dfrac{3}{4}}\cdot\maroonD{96}$  The expression $\blueD{\dfrac{3}{4}}\cdot\maroonD{96}$ is equivalent to $75\%$ of $96$.
$\dfrac{4}{3}\cdot 96=128$  The expression $\dfrac{4}{3}\cdot 96$ is **not** equivalent to $75\%$ of $96$.
$75\cdot 96=7{,}200$  The expression $75\cdot 96$ is **not** equivalent to $75\%$ of $96$.
The options that have the same value as $75\%$ of $96$ are:  - $\dfrac{75}{100}\cdot 96$ - $0.75\cdot 96$ - $\dfrac{3}{4}\cdot 96$

question.content: **Which of the following options have the same value as $20\%$ of $45$?**

hints.content: $\blueD{20\%}$ $\greenD{\text{of}}$ $\maroonD{45}$ is the same as $\blueD{20\%}\greenD{\times}\maroonD{45}$.  To solve $\blueD{20\%}\greenD{\times}\maroonD{45}$, we need to convert $\blueD{20\%}$ to either a decimal or a fraction.
Percent means per hundred, so $\blueD{20\%}$ is equivalent to $\blueD{\dfrac{20}{100}}$ which is also equal to $\blueD{20\div 100=0.2}$.   $\blueD{20\%= \dfrac{20}{100} = 0.2}$
$\begin{align}\blueD{20\%}\ \text{of}\ \maroonD{45}&=\blueD{\dfrac{20}{100}}\cdot\maroonD{45}\\\\ &=\blueD{0.2}\cdot\maroonD{45}\\\\ &=9 \end{align}$  Are any of the other choices equivalent?

The fractions $\dfrac{20}{100}$ and $\dfrac{1}{5}$ are equivalent. So:  $\blueD{\dfrac{20}{100}}\cdot\maroonD{45}=\blueD{\dfrac{1}{5}}\cdot\maroonD{45}$  The expression $\blueD{\dfrac{1}{5}}\cdot\maroonD{45}$ is equivalent to $20\%$ of $45$.
$\dfrac{20}{45}\cdot 100\approx 44.4$  The expression $\dfrac{20}{45}\cdot 100$ is **not** equivalent to $20\%$ of $45$.
$20\cdot 45=900$  The expression $20\cdot 45$ is **not** equivalent to $20\%$ of $45$.
The options that have the same value as $20\%$ of $45$ are:  - $\dfrac{20}{100}\cdot 45$ - $0.2\cdot 45$ - $\dfrac{1}{5}\cdot 45$

question.content: **Which of the following options have the same value as $25\%$ of $64$?**

hints.content: $\blueD{25\%}$ $\greenD{\text{of}}$ $\maroonD{64}$ is the same as $\blueD{25\%}\greenD{\times}\maroonD{64}$.  To solve $\blueD{25\%}\greenD{\times}\maroonD{64}$, we need to convert $\blueD{25\%}$ to either a decimal or a fraction.
Percent means per hundred, so $\blueD{25\%}$ is equivalent to $\blueD{\dfrac{25}{100}}$ which is also equal to $\blueD{25\div 100=0.25}$.   $\blueD{25\%= \dfrac{25}{100} = 0.25}$
$\begin{align}\blueD{25\%}\ \text{of}\ \maroonD{64}&=\blueD{\dfrac{25}{100}}\cdot\maroonD{64}\\\\ &=\blueD{0.25}\cdot\maroonD{64}\\\\ &=16 \end{align}$  Are any of the other choices equivalent?
$25\cdot 64=1{,}600$  The expression $25\cdot 64$ is **not** equivalent to $25\%$ of $64$.
$64\div \dfrac{25}{100}=256$  The expression $64\div \dfrac{25}{100}$ is **not** equivalent to $25\%$ of $64$.
$25\div \dfrac{64}{100}= 39.0625$  The expression $25\div \dfrac{64}{100}$ is **not** equivalent to $25\%$ of $64$.
The options that have the same value as $25\%$ of $64$ are:  - $\dfrac{25}{100}\cdot 64$ - $0.25\cdot 64$
